channel.title: Itemreq slayerlvl
channel.description: how would i make an item like dclaws have to have a slayer lvl of 90 or 99? [PI]

item.title: Itemreq slayerlvl
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“scenemo, post:3, topic:393528”]thats what i did but still doesnt work

[quote]
if(c.slayerLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) < c.slayerLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need an slayer level of “+c.slayerLevelReq+” to wield this weapon.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}[/quote][/quote]
that should work, but you might have to break the action. I’m not sure if the canWearItem boolean actually stops it from equipping

Read full topic
